data.system_settings: iPhone 8 Plus, iPad Air 2 - iOS 12 Public Beta 10
data.actual_result: It is just a still inline image. If the image is uploaded, it will be a gif though. Pasting gifs shows the gif indicator and animation too.
data.expected_result: You should see the gif tag and animation.
data.short_description: Gif animation/tag not shown for inline images when uploading from your camera roll
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any text chat - Click on the paperclip icon - Upload a gif - Observe the inline gif
